mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `group` (uid, title, content, pic_url, tag_id, created_time, update_time) VALUE (#{uid}, #{title}, #{content}, #{pic_url}, #{tag_id}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT id, title, content, pic_url picUrl, tag_id tagId, created_time createdTime FROM `group` WHERE uid=#{uid} ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 0, #{limit}
SELECT id, title, content, pic_url picUrl, tag_id tagId, created_time createdTime FROM `group` WHERE id=#{id}
SELECT id, title FROM `group` WHERE uid=#{uid} ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT g.id, title FROM `group` g INNER JOIN group_fun gf ON g.id=gf.gid WHERE g.uid=#{uid} ORDER BY g.id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO group_fun (gid, uid, created_time) VALUE (#{gid}, #{uid}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM group_fun WHERE gid=#{gid} AND uid=#{uid}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `group` WHERE id=#{gid} AND uid=#{uid}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM group_fun WHERE gid=#{gid} AND uid=#{uid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO group_fun_history (gid, uid, created_time, deleted_time) SELECT gid, uid, created_time, now() FROM group_fun WHERE gid=#{gid} AND uid=#{uid}
